moves.name: Potion
moves.effect: Restores an ally’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Mega Healing!
moves.effect: Reduces the user’s sync move countdown by 1. When used by Mega Venusaur, reduces the user’s sync move countdown by 2. When used in a co-op battle, reduces the sync move countdown of all allied players instead. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to all allied sync pairs.

syncMove.name: Tenacious Frenzy Plant
syncMove.description: Become Mega Venusaur until the end of battle. This move’s power increases when the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Venomous 4
passives.description: Has a chance (50%) of leaving the target badly poisoned when the user’s move targeting that opponent is successful.

passives.name: Sundering 9
passives.description: Lowers the target’s Defense or Sp. Def—or both—by one stat rank when the user’s move targeting that opponent is successful.

passives.name: Adrenaline 2
passives.description: Reduces the sync move countdown by 2 the first time the user’s sync move is used each battle.

grid.bonus: Potion:Master Healer 2- Increases the amount of HP restored by the user’s healing moves.
Potion:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Razor Leaf:Critical Strike 2- Powers up the user’s attacks when they become critical hits.
Razor Leaf:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Frenzy Plant:Move Gauge Refresh 4- Has a chance (50%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Frenzy Plant:Discombobulate 4- Has a chance (50%) of lowering the target’s accuracy by one stat rank when the user’s attack move is successful.
Mega Healing!:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Speeding Sun 2- Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is sunny.
Healing Sun 1- Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action while the weather is sunny.
HP Advantage 4- The larger the user’s percentage of remaining HP, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Toxic Power 5- Powers up the user’s moves when the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.
Discourage 1- Lowers the Sp. Atk of all opposing sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user enters a battle.
Relentless- The more the target’s Defense is lowered, the more it powers up the user’s sync moves.
Potent Toxin 2- Increases the amount of damage the target takes from being poisoned or badly poisoned.
Hem In 2- Has a chance (30%) of lowering the target’s evasiveness by one stat rank when the user’s attack move is successful.
